verses.verse: Now <S%G1161><s%> the feast <S%G1859><s%> of unleavened <S%G106><s%> bread drew near, <S%G1448><s%> which is called <S%G3004><s%> the Passover. <S%G3957><s%>

And the chief <S%G749><s%> priests <S%G749><s%> and scribes <S%G1122><s%> sought <S%G2212><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> they might kill <S%G337><s%> him; for they feared <S%G5399><s%> the people. <S%G2992><s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> entered <S%G1525><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Judas <S%G2455><s%> surnamed <S%G1941><s%> Iscariot, <S%G2469><s%> being <S%G5607><s%> of the number <S%G706><s%> of the twelve. <S%G1427><s%>
And he went <S%G565><s%> his way, and communed <S%G4814><s%> with the chief <S%G749><s%> priests <S%G749><s%> and captains, <S%G4755><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> he might betray <S%G3860><s%> him to them.
And they were glad, <S%G5463><s%> and covenanted <S%G4934><s%> to give <S%G1325><s%> him money. <S%G694><s%>
And he promised, <S%G1843><s%> and sought <S%G2212><s%> opportunity <S%G2120><s%> to betray <S%G3860><s%> him to them in the absence <S%G817><s%> of the multitude. <S%G3793><s%>
Then <S%G1161><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> the day <S%G2250><s%> of unleavened <S%G106><s%> bread, when <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739><s%> the passover <S%G3957><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> be killed. <S%G2380><s%>
And he sent <S%G649><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> and John, <S%G2491><s%> saying, <S%G2036><s%> Go <S%G4198><s%> and prepare <S%G2090><s%> us the passover, <S%G3957><s%> that we may eat. <S%G5315><s%>
And they said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Where <S%G4226><s%> will <S%G2309><s%> you that we prepare? <S%G2090><s%>

And he said <S%G2036><s%> to them, Behold, <S%G2400><s%> when you are entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the city, <S%G4172><s%> there shall a man <S%G444><s%> meet <S%G4876><s%> you, bearing <S%G941><s%> a pitcher <S%G2765><s%> of water; <S%G5204><s%> follow <S%G190><s%> him into <S%G1519><s%> the house <S%G3614><s%> where <S%G3757><s%> he enters <S%G1531><s%> in.

And you shall say <S%G2046><s%> to the manager <S%G3611><s%> of the house, <S%G3614><s%> The Master <S%G1320><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to you, Where <S%G4226><s%> is the guest room, <S%G2646><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> I shall eat <S%G5315><s%> the passover <S%G3957><s%> with my disciples? <S%G3101><s%>
And he shall show <S%G1166><s%> you a large <S%G3173><s%> upper <S%G508><s%> room furnished: <S%G4766><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> make <S%G2090><s%> ready. <S%G2090><s%>
And they went, <S%G565><s%> and found <S%G2147><s%> as he had said <S%G2046><s%> to them: and they made <S%G2090><s%> ready <S%G2090><s%> the passover. <S%G3957><s%>
And when <S%G3753><s%> <S%G3588><s%> the hour <S%G5610><s%> was come, <S%G1096><s%> he sat <S%G377><s%> down, <S%G377><s%> and the twelve <S%G1427><s%> apostles <S%G652><s%> with him.

And he said <S%G2036><s%> to them, With desire <S%G1939><s%> I have desired <S%G1937><s%> to eat <S%G5315><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> passover <S%G3957><s%> with you before <S%G4253><s%> I suffer: <S%G3958><s%>

For I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, I will not any <S%G3765><s%> more <S%G3765><s%> eat <S%G5315><s%> thereof, <S%G1538><s%> <S%G846><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> it be fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> in the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

And he took <S%G1209><s%> the cup, <S%G4221><s%> and gave thanks, <S%G2168><s%> and said, <S%G2036><s%> Take <S%G2983><s%> this, <S%G5124><s%> and divide <S%G1266><s%> it among yourselves: <S%G1438><s%>

For I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, I will not drink <S%G4095><s%> of the fruit <S%G1081><s%> of the vine, <S%G288><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> shall come. <S%G2064><s%>

And he took <S%G2983><s%> bread, <S%G740><s%> and gave thanks, <S%G2168><s%> and broke <S%G2806><s%> it, and gave <S%G1325><s%> to them, saying, <S%G3004><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> is my body <S%G4983><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is given <S%G1325><s%> for you: this <S%G5124><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> in remembrance <S%G364><s%> of me.

Likewise <S%G5615><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> the cup <S%G4221><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> supper, <S%G1172><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> cup <S%G4221><s%> is the new <S%G2537><s%> testament <S%G1242><s%> in my blood, <S%G129><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is shed <S%G1632><s%> for you.
But, behold, <S%G2400><s%> the hand <S%G5495><s%> of him that betrays <S%G3860><s%> me is with me on <S%G1909><s%> the table. <S%G5132><s%>

And truly <S%G3303><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> goes, <S%G4198><s%> as it was determined: <S%G3724><s%> but woe <S%G3759><s%> to that man <S%G444><s%> by whom <S%G3739><s%> he is betrayed! <S%G3860><s%>

And they began <S%G756><s%> to inquire <S%G4802><s%> among <S%G4314><s%> themselves, <S%G1438><s%> which <S%G5101><s%> of them it was that should <S%G3195><s%> do <S%G4238><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> thing.
And there was also <S%G2532><s%> a strife <S%G5379><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> them, which <S%G5101><s%> of them should be accounted <S%G1380><s%> the greatest. <S%G3187><s%>

And he said <S%G2036><s%> to them, The kings <S%G935><s%> of the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> exercise <S%G2961><s%> lordship <S%G2961><s%> over them; and they that exercise <S%G1850><s%> authority <S%G1850><s%> on them are called <S%G2564><s%> benefactors. <S%G2110><s%>

But you shall not be so: <S%G3779><s%> but he that is greatest <S%G3187><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you, let him be as the younger; <S%G3501><s%> and he that is chief, <S%G2233><s%> as he that does serve. <S%G1247><s%>

For whether <S%G5101><s%> is greater, <S%G3187><s%> he that sits <S%G345><s%> at <S%G345><s%> meat, or <S%G2228><s%> he that serves? <S%G1247><s%> is not he that sits <S%G345><s%> at <S%G345><s%> meat? but I am <S%G1510><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3319><s%> you as he that serves. <S%G1247><s%>
You are they which have continued <S%G1265><s%> with me in my temptations. <S%G3986><s%>
And I appoint <S%G1303><s%> to you a kingdom, <S%G932><s%> as my Father <S%G3962><s%> has appointed <S%G1303><s%> to me;

That you may eat <S%G2068><s%> and drink <S%G4095><s%> at <S%G1909><s%> my table <S%G5132><s%> in my kingdom, <S%G932><s%> and sit <S%G2523><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> thrones <S%G2362><s%> judging <S%G2919><s%> the twelve <S%G1427><s%> tribes <S%G5443><s%> of Israel. <S%G2474><s%>

And the Lord <S%G2962><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> Simon, <S%G4613><s%> Simon, <S%G4613><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%> has desired <S%G1809><s%> to have you, that he may sift <S%G4617><s%> you as wheat: <S%G4621><s%>

But I have prayed <S%G1189><s%> for you, that your faith <S%G4102><s%> fail <S%G1587><s%> not: and when <S%G4218><s%> you are converted, <S%G1994><s%> strengthen <S%G4741><s%> your brothers. <S%G80><s%>

And he said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Lord, <S%G2962><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> ready <S%G2092><s%> to go <S%G4198><s%> with you, both <S%G2532><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> prison, <S%G5438><s%> and to death. <S%G2288><s%>

And he said, <S%G3004><s%> I tell <S%G3004><s%> you, Peter, <S%G4074><s%> the cock <S%G220><s%> shall not crow <S%G5455><s%> this <S%G4594><s%> day, <S%G4594><s%> before <S%G4250><s%> <S%G2228><s%> that you shall thrice <S%G5151><s%> deny <S%G533><s%> that you know <S%G1492><s%> me.

And he said <S%G2036><s%> to them, When <S%G3753><s%> I sent <S%G649><s%> you without <S%G817><s%> purse, <S%G905><s%> and money, <S%G4082><s%> and shoes, <S%G5266><s%> lacked <S%G5302><s%> you any <S%G5100><s%> thing? And they said, <S%G2036><s%> Nothing. <S%G3762><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> he to them, But now, <S%G3568><s%> he that has <S%G2192><s%> a purse, <S%G905><s%> let him take <S%G142><s%> it, and likewise <S%G3668><s%> his money: <S%G4082><s%> and he that has <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> sword, <S%G3162><s%> let him sell <S%G4453><s%> his garment, <S%G2440><s%> and buy <S%G59><s%> one.

For I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, that this <S%G5124><s%> that is written <S%G1125><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> yet <S%G2089><s%> be accomplished <S%G5055><s%> in me, And he was reckoned <S%G3049><s%> among <S%G3326><s%> the transgressors: <S%G459><s%> for the things concerning <S%G4012><s%> me have <S%G2192><s%> an end. <S%G5056><s%>
And they said, <S%G2036><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> here <S%G5602><s%> are two <S%G1417><s%> swords. <S%G3162><s%> And he said <S%G2036><s%> to them, It is enough. <S%G2425><s%>

And he came <S%G1831><s%> out, and went, <S%G4198><s%> as he was wont, <S%G2596><s%> <S%G1485><s%> to the mount <S%G3735><s%> of Olives; <S%G1636><s%> and his disciples <S%G3101><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> followed <S%G190><s%> him.
And when he was at <S%G1909><s%> the place, <S%G5117><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> to them, Pray <S%G4336><s%> that you enter <S%G1525><s%> not into <S%G1519><s%> temptation. <S%G3986><s%>
And he was withdrawn <S%G645><s%> from them about <S%G5616><s%> a stone's <S%G3037><s%> cast, <S%G1000><s%> and kneeled <S%G5087><s%> <S%G1119><s%> down, and prayed, <S%G4336><s%>

Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> you be willing, <S%G1014><s%> remove <S%G3911><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> cup <S%G4221><s%> from me: nevertheless <S%G4133><s%> not my will, <S%G2307><s%> but yours, <S%G4674><s%> be done. <S%G1096><s%>
And there appeared <S%G3700><s%> an angel <S%G32><s%> to him from heaven, <S%G3772><s%> strengthening <S%G1765><s%> him.

And being <S%G1096><s%> in an agony <S%G74><s%> he prayed <S%G4336><s%> more <S%G1617><s%> earnestly: <S%G1617><s%> and his sweat <S%G2402><s%> was as it were great drops <S%G2361><s%> of blood <S%G129><s%> falling <S%G2597><s%> down <S%G2597><s%> to the ground. <S%G1093><s%>
And when he rose <S%G450><s%> up from prayer, <S%G4335><s%> and was come <S%G2064><s%> to his disciples, <S%G3101><s%> he found <S%G2147><s%> them sleeping <S%G2837><s%> for sorrow, <S%G3077><s%>

And said <S%G2036><s%> to them, Why <S%G5101><s%> sleep <S%G2518><s%> you? rise <S%G450><s%> and pray, <S%G4336><s%> lest <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3361><s%> you enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> temptation. <S%G3986><s%>

And while he yet <S%G2089><s%> spoke, <S%G2980><s%> behold <S%G2400><s%> a multitude, <S%G3793><s%> and he that was called <S%G3004><s%> Judas, <S%G2455><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of the twelve, <S%G1427><s%> went <S%G4281><s%> before <S%G4281><s%> them, and drew near <S%G1448><s%> to Jesus <S%G2424><s%> to kiss <S%G5368><s%> him.
But Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Judas, <S%G2455><s%> betray <S%G3860><s%> you the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> with a kiss? <S%G5370><s%>

When they which were about <S%G4012><s%> him saw <S%G1492><s%> what <S%G3588><s%> would follow, <S%G2071><s%> they said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Lord, <S%G2962><s%> shall we smite <S%G3960><s%> with the sword? <S%G3162><s%>

And one <S%G1520><s%> of them smote <S%G3960><s%> the servant <S%G1401><s%> of the high <S%G749><s%> priest, <S%G749><s%> and cut <S%G851><s%> off <S%G851><s%> his right <S%G1188><s%> ear. <S%G3775><s%>

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said, <S%G2036><s%> Suffer <S%G1439><s%> you thus <S%G5127><s%> far. <S%G2193><s%> And he touched <S%G680><s%> his ear, <S%G5621><s%> and healed <S%G2390><s%> him.

Then <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to the chief <S%G749><s%> priests, <S%G749><s%> and captains <S%G4755><s%> of the temple, <S%G2411><s%> and the elders, <S%G4245><s%> which were come <S%G3854><s%> to him, Be you come <S%G1831><s%> out, as against <S%G1909><s%> a thief, <S%G3027><s%> with swords <S%G3162><s%> and staves? <S%G3586><s%>

When I was daily <S%G2596><s%> <S%G2250><s%> with you in the temple, <S%G2411><s%> you stretched <S%G1614><s%> forth <S%G1614><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> hands <S%G5495><s%> against <S%G1909><s%> me: but this <S%G3778><s%> is your <S%G5216><s%> hour, <S%G5610><s%> and the power <S%G1849><s%> of darkness. <S%G4655><s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> took <S%G4815><s%> they him, and led <S%G71><s%> him, and brought <S%G1521><s%> him into <S%G1519><s%> the high <S%G749><s%> priest's <S%G749><s%> house. <S%G3624><s%> And Peter <S%G4074><s%> followed <S%G190><s%> afar <S%G3113><s%> off.

And when they had kindled <S%G681><s%> a fire <S%G4442><s%> in the middle <S%G3319><s%> of the hall, <S%G833><s%> and were set <S%G4776><s%> down <S%G4776><s%> together, <S%G4776><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> sat <S%G2521><s%> down <S%G2521><s%> among <S%G3319><s%> them.

But a certain <S%G5100><s%> maid <S%G3814><s%> beheld <S%G1492><s%> him as he sat <S%G2521><s%> by the fire, <S%G5457><s%> and earnestly <S%G816><s%> looked <S%G816><s%> on him, and said, <S%G2036><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> man was also <S%G2532><s%> with him.
And he denied <S%G720><s%> him, saying, <S%G3004><s%> Woman, <S%G1135><s%> I know <S%G1492><s%> him not.

And after <S%G3326><s%> a little <S%G1024><s%> while another <S%G2087><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> him, and said, <S%G5346><s%> You are <S%G1488><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> of them. And Peter <S%G4074><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> Man, <S%G444><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> not.

And about <S%G5616><s%> the space <S%G1339><s%> of one <S%G3391><s%> hour <S%G5610><s%> after another <S%G243><s%> confidently <S%G1340><s%> affirmed, <S%G1340><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Of a truth <S%G225><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> fellow also <S%G2532><s%> was with him: for he is a Galilaean. <S%G1057><s%>

And Peter <S%G4074><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> Man, <S%G444><s%> I know <S%G1492><s%> not what <S%G3739><s%> you say. <S%G3004><s%> And immediately, <S%G3916><s%> while he yet <S%G2089><s%> spoke, <S%G2980><s%> the cock <S%G220><s%> crew. <S%G5455><s%>

And the Lord <S%G2962><s%> turned, <S%G4762><s%> and looked <S%G1689><s%> on Peter. <S%G4074><s%> And Peter <S%G4074><s%> remembered <S%G5279><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> how <S%G5613><s%> he had said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Before <S%G4250><s%> the cock <S%G220><s%> crow, <S%G5455><s%> you shall deny <S%G533><s%> me thrice. <S%G5151><s%>
And Peter <S%G4074><s%> went <S%G1831><s%> out, and wept <S%G2799><s%> bitterly. <S%G4090><s%>
And the men <S%G435><s%> that held <S%G4912><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> mocked <S%G1702><s%> him, and smote <S%G1194><s%> him.

And when they had blindfolded <S%G4028><s%> him, they struck <S%G5180><s%> him on the face, <S%G4383><s%> and asked <S%G1905><s%> him, saying, <S%G3004><s%> Prophesy, <S%G4395><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> is it that smote <S%G3817><s%> you?
And many <S%G4183><s%> other <S%G2087><s%> things blasphemously <S%G987><s%> spoke <S%G3004><s%> they against <S%G1519><s%> him.

And as soon as it was day, <S%G2250><s%> the elders <S%G4244><s%> of the people <S%G2992><s%> and the chief <S%G749><s%> priests <S%G749><s%> and the scribes <S%G1122><s%> came <S%G4863><s%> together, <S%G4863><s%> and led <S%G321><s%> him into <S%G1519><s%> their council, <S%G4892><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%>
Are <S%G1488><s%> you the Christ? <S%G5547><s%> tell <S%G2036><s%> us. And he said <S%G2036><s%> to them, If <S%G1437><s%> I tell <S%G2036><s%> you, you will not believe: <S%G4100><s%>
And if <S%G1437><s%> I also <S%G2532><s%> ask <S%G2065><s%> you, you will not answer <S%G611><s%> me, nor <S%G2228><s%> let <S%G630><s%> me go. <S%G630><s%>
Hereafter <S%G575><s%> <S%G3568><s%> shall the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> sit <S%G2521><s%> on <S%G1537><s%> the right <S%G1188><s%> hand of the power <S%G1411><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> said <S%G5346><s%> they all, <S%G3956><s%> Are <S%G1488><s%> you then <S%G3767><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God? <S%G2316><s%> And he said <S%G2036><s%> to them, You say <S%G3004><s%> that I am. <S%G1510><s%>

And they said, <S%G2036><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> need <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5532><s%> we any <S%G2089><s%> further <S%G2089><s%> witness? <S%G3141><s%> for we ourselves have heard <S%G191><s%> of his own <S%G1438><s%> mouth. <S%G4750><s%>
